author: rekovic
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes part of the configuration of L1T Calo which retrieves conditions from a specific location (instead of via GT) and which is depricated for a while (non-used since we moved away from hacking conditions).

title: L1T Calo - Remove retrieving conditions via config
